text: This one was sent to me by Fascinators by Juila Bee.
She's based in Salt Lake City, Utah.
and she found my blog and reached out to me and asked.
if I would want to try one of her fascinators out.
So a fascinator is going to be based on a head band,
or sometimes it'll be based on a pin that you can put in.
And it's like a smaller-level hat, I guess. I like this
one because of the crinoline detail, the way it wraps,
and then the feather detail too.
They're not as hot. A lot of times, a lot of people will
complain about hats being hot, especially if it's sunny on Derby or Oaks Day.
You'll have the sun beating right down on you, and your
hat's covering your head, so your head gets hot.
Sobetter air flow. *laughs* A little more practical.
